verses.text: Great is the LORD , and greatly to be praised
Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth,
God is known in her palaces for a refuge.
For, lo, the kings were assembled,
They saw it, and so they marvelled;
Fear took hold upon them there,
Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish
As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God:
We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God,
According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth:
Walk about Zion, and go round about her:
Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces;
For this God is our God for ever and ever:
